ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] I need advise please
ygData.msgSnippet: I got my skill to 110 before powered gloves were discovered.  Because of this it cost me about 25k to get to 148 skill.  Since reaching 148, I ve made 82
ygData.messageBody:
I got my skill to 110 before powered gloves were discovered.  Because of this it cost me about 25k to get to 148 skill.  Since reaching 148, I've made 82 attempts at rebreathers and have only one skill increase to show for it.   =(
 
What has anyone else's skill increase rate been on rebreathers?
 
Boskonovitch
Frustrated Tinkerer on Fennin Ro, stuck at 149
----- Original Message -----
From: Aranathes Bonethrower
To: EQ_Tinkering@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, February 03, 2001 6:42 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] I need advise please

Some of us raised our skill to around 150 before they put in the gnomish
power gloves and catapults.  At that time, you had to raise skill from 104
by doing aqualungs at 200+pp an attempt, and at 104 skill, you didn't have
alot of sucess at making them.  I am at 165 skill, and have a net loss of
around 50 or 60k total.

Ghirardelli
E'ci

----- Original Message -----
From: "Funky T. Munky" <toking@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, February 03, 2001 5:12 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] I need advise please
